attributes.action: Recognition of Rhodesian/Zimbabwean forces on Armistice Day
attributes.additional_details: Since Zimbabwe's withdrawal from the Commonwealth, there has not been specific recognition of the sacrifice and courage that Rhodesian/Zimbabwean service men of all races have made on behalf of Great Britain suring the annual remembrance ceremonies. We, the undersigned, petition the government to recitify this fact, allowing a representative to lay a wreath at the cenotaph alongside representatives of other Commonwealth nations.
